item.description:
The next HAC book discussion will be on Sunday, October 3, 3 p.m. until 5 p.m. and we will meet at USNH, 700 Hartford Turnpike in Hamden. The book we will be reading is "The Good Earth" by Pearl S. Buck. Lots of copies are available in Connecticut public libraries as well as in book stores and online.

We also will view the 1937 film "The Good Earth," based on Pearl Buck's novel on Saturday, September 25, starting at 3PM at the same location as the book discussion. The film runs 138 min.

Please RSVP for the book discussion. It would be appreciated if you indicate in your RSVP whether you will be attending the film viewing.

For updates and to sign up for our e-mail list, go to www.cthumanist.org
item.name: Book Discussion: "The Good Earth" by Pearl S. Buck
